name: mcfly-timezone
description: Changes deprecated timezone strings into modern IANA Olsen Timezone equivalents.

scripts.cov:html: NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=error ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul --recursive -s 120 test && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report text-summary lcov && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.cov:coveralls: NODE_ENV=test LOG_LEVEL=error ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --require coffee-coverage/register-istanbul --recursive -s 120 test && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
